byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and REBECCA WHITE

lead_paragraph: Christopher Duran was the victim of a “directed shooting” on Friday, a police official said. The authorities released an image from surveillance video of a suspect.

headline.print_headline: Bronx Boy, 14, Killed in ‘Point Blank’ Shooting Caught on Surveillance Video
headline.main: Bronx Boy, 14, Killed in ‘Point Blank’ Shooting Caught on Surveillance Video

snippet: Christopher Duran was the victim of a “directed shooting” on Friday, a police official said. The authorities released an image from surveillance video of a suspect.
abstract: Police officials say they believe Christopher Duran, 14-year-old shot in Bronx, was intended target of attack, although it is not clear why he was singled out; police have collected surveillance footage of attack; shooting coincides with spike in gun violence across city, particularly in 44th Precinct, which was where Duran was killed.
